task.title: Exporting a Pipeline
task.shortdesc: Export a pipeline when you want to use the pipeline with another . You might also export a pipeline as a safeguard before you upgrade the .

context.p: When you export a pipeline, you receive a JSON file named after the pipeline. For example, when you export a pipeline named MyPipeline, the exported file is named MyPipeline.json.

step.cmd: In the Pipeline library, click the Actions icon for the pipeline that you want to export.

step.stepresult: The window generates the JSON file and saves it to your default downloads directory.
